title: Konstantinos Tasoulas - Wikipedia
snippet: After four rounds of voting, he was elected by the parliament on 12 February 2025, after winning the votes 160 of 300 MPs. He was sworn in on 13 March 2025. Tasoulas is married to Fani Stathopoulou and they have two children.

title: Presidential Election 2025 Greece
snippet: Author of the European Elections ... (New Democracy, ND) won the Greek presidential election in the 4th round of voting on 12 February with 160 votes....

title: Konstantinos Tasoulas becomes Greece's new president after 4th parliamentary vote
snippet: Giannitsis received 34 votes, Katseli 29, and Kyriakou 14, while 39 lawmakers abstained. Having won the election, Tasoulas is set to be sworn in on March 13, succeeding Sakellaropoulou.

title: Greece Elects New President Despite MPs' Walkout Over Train Crash | Balkan Insight
snippet: Konstantinos Tasoulas (centre) at parliament in Athens, March 2020. Photo: EPA-EFE/THANASSIS STAVRAKIS/POOL · Greece’s parliament on Wednesday elected former parliamentary speaker Konstantinos Tasoulas, the candidate of the ruling New Democracy ...

title: Veteran conservative politician sworn in as Greece’s new president
snippet: Former Greek President Katerina Sakellaropoulou (C-R) stands next to the newly sworn-in Greek President Konstantinos Tasoulas (C-L) at the presidential palace in Athens, Greece on March 13, 2025.
